For Gaza family living in tent city, campfire is the only homeFor the Maarouf family, living in Rafah's tent city after fleeing their house in Gaza at the start of Israel's deadly bombardment nearly three months ago, home is now the small campfire they sit around each night. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:45:31 GMT RTN7M7GQZJMDZESLJ2H6I544TE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-family-living-tent-city-campfire-is-only-home-2024-01-02/Mohammad Salem世界中东
Turkey to block UK minehunter ships intended for UkraineTurkey said on Tuesday it would not allow two British minehunter ships to transit its waters en route to the Black Sea for use by Ukraine since it would violate an international pact concerning wartime passage of the straits. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:33:42 GMT LSAAZRZIHZOW5JQKNA4ZX3VDSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-block-uk-minehunter-ships-intending-ukraine-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Israel says it will appear before ICJ to counter South Africa's Gaza caseIsrael will appear before the International Court of Justice (ICJ) at the Hague to contest South Africa's genocide accusations over the war with Hamas in Gaza, an Israeli government spokesman said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:32:26 GMT AQ5DG2BHJZLSVCXWPRY3CTWGZU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-says-it-will-appear-before-icj-counter-south-africas-gaza-case-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Spanish soccer player Hermoso testifies about Rubiales World Cup kissSpanish soccer star Jenni Hermoso testified in Madrid High Court on Tuesday over the kiss she said football federation chief Luis Rubiales planted on her lips without her consent after Spain's victory in the Women's World Cup last summer. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:16:31 GMT KDMZKWPOAZKODIKVQQTMRFQSK4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/spanish-soccer-player-hermoso-testizes-about-rubiales-world-cup-kiss-2024-01-02/Reuters运动的足球
Only 15% of Israelis want Netanyahu to keep job after Gaza war, poll findsOnly 15% of Israelis want Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to stay in office after the war on Hamas in Gaza ends, though many more still support his strategy of crushing the militants in the Palestinian enclave, according to a poll published on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 12:53:19 GMT MASTJ3SNYRPCLBA5I7EX7Y4PSU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/only-15-israelis-want-netanyahu-keep-job-after-gaza-war-poll-finds-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Bangladesh's tangles with Yunus, Nobel winner and microloan founderA Bangladesh court has sentenced the country's only Nobel laureate, Mohammad Yunus, to six months in jail over labour law violations, a crime he says he did not commit, days ahead of a Jan. 7 general election boycotted by the main opposition party. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 12:46:11 GMT XXRVNHTRBZOGBMLYZTRZHD6KJE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladeshs-tangles-with-yunus-nobel-winner-microloan-Founder-2024-01-02/Ruma Paul, Sudipto Ganguly世界亚太地区
One killed as Ukrainian missiles target Russia's Belgorod region, officials sayOne man was killed and seven people were wounded on Tuesday in a Ukrainian attack on the city and region of Belgorod, near Russia's border with Ukraine, the Defence Ministry and regional officials said. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 11:56:42 GMT MVCKW4GD5VKXFH4J25HGWPD7L4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-downs-9-ukrainian-missiles-over-belgorod-region-two-wounded-2024-01-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Explainer: What will happen to Oscar Pistorius when he is released from jail?Former Paralympic star Oscar Pistorius will be released from prison on Friday after he was granted parole nearly 11 years after killing his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 11:26:41 GMT VJRHMLXSSFOZ5FWSOIE5GZKCXM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/what-will-happen-oscar-pistorius-when-he-is-released-jail-2024-01-02/Reuters世界非洲
Israel ex-spymaster Zamir, whose 1973 war warning was ignored, dead at 98Zvi Zamir, a former head of Israeli intelligence agency Mossad whose warning that Egypt and Syria were about to attack Israel in 1973 was largely ignored by the government, has died at the age of 98. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 10:52:33 GMT SWWMTGMB2VOGPHPCLKA4OYDS6M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-ex-spymaster-zamir-whose-1973-war-warning-was-ignored-dead-98-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Poland says threat level from Russian strikes reduced, planes return to basePoland said on Tuesday that planes protecting its airspace had returned to base after the threat level related to Russian strikes on Ukraine had reduced. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 10:09:20 GMT XQ7XNFHWWFJBPAANDMKVJGWMPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-says-threat-level- Russian-strikes-reduced-planes-return-base-2024-01-02/Reuters世界欧洲
All passengers, crew escape blaze on Japan Airlines plane after Tokyo airport collisionAll 379 passengers and crew of a Japan Airlines plane miraculously escaped from a fire following a collision with a Coast Guard aircraft at Tokyo's Haneda airport on Tuesday, but five of the six crew of the coast guard plane were killed. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:19:52 GMT 5EXEWXVS3JISFNFZAFPKGYW4NI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fire-breaks-out-plane-runway-japans-tokyo-haneda-airport-nhk-2024-01-02/Daniel Leussink世界亚太地区
